Description_lang: When Obtained: A Hyper-Reactive Slime attaches itself to you and when you are struck in combat it has a chance to leap at your attacker dealing $s1 damage over $s2 sec. It will stick with you for $d while outdoors in the Shadowlands.
AuraDescription_lang: Chance when struck for a slime to leap to assist you dealing $s1 damage over $s2 sec while you are outdoors in the Shadowlands.
